text: Greystead is a village and civil parish in Northumberland, England west of Bellingham. The population as of the 2011 census was less than 100. It shares a parish council with the adjacent civil parish of Tarset. == Governance == Greystead is in the parliamentary constituency of Hexham. ==External links == *GENUKI (Accessed: 3 December 2008) Category:Villages in Northumberland
title: Greystead
